alert.note: Alert for Eastern Grant; Eastern Mineral; Hampshire; Hardy; Western Grant; Western Mineral (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 18 at 1:16AM EST until February 18 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts around 55 mph, becoming northwest after 2 AM. * WHERE...Allegany and Garrett County in western Maryland, the Shenandoah Valley of Virginia, and the Potomac Highlands of eastern West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Grant; Eastern Mineral; Hampshire; Hardy; Western Grant; Western Mineral
